comments.content: Both [Echelon](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143521/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=VIT0000006) and [Expletive Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143521/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=VIT0000007) from Virus have a similar feel as well.

You asked for "close". Suggestions would have to include [Memima](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143521/http:/www.philsfonts.com/showing.html?sku=TT010008X1M1&start=1) and [Little Days Alt](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143521/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/westwind/index.htm)   
, which directly took its inspiration from Memima. Also, there's Kinema Moon's [ito](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143521/http:/www.kinemamoon.com/#).   
   
Edit: Oops, I thought it a little odd that this post wasn't responded to yet. You already covered Memima in the other post, Patricia.   
   
[Moderator edit] I moved Mike's post from the duplicate thread to this one.
Echelon looks like it was drawn with an Etch-a-Sketch!
